values: Venom is a poisonous substance that comes from animals or plants.
A snake’s venom can be used to cure the illnesses it creates.

- n. (某些蛇、蝎子等分泌的)毒液
- 愤恨的感情或语言
- 毒物
n.（某些蛇、蝎子等分泌的）毒液,恶意,<古>毒物v.放毒
毒液 and transmitted to prey or an enemy chiefly by biting or stinging)； 毒物(poisonous matter)； 恶意(ill will； malevolence)
毒液； 恶意， 怨恨
